solution_line_template: Every day Zainab passes out flyers, she earns ${hourly_wage} x {hours_per_day} = $<<{hourly_wage}*{hours_per_day}={daily_earnings}>>{daily_earnings}
If she hands out flyers for {days_per_week} days, she'll earn ${daily_earnings}/day * {days_per_week} days = $<<{daily_earnings}*{days_per_week}={weekly_earnings}>>{weekly_earnings}
If she passes out flyers for {num_weeks} weeks, she will earn ${weekly_earnings} * {num_weeks} = $<<{weekly_earnings}*{num_weeks}={total_earnings}>>{total_earnings}
